= `tagToElseIfVar` =
[http://code.google.com/p/querytemplates/w/list Wiki] > [Syntax Syntax] > [elseSyntax else] > [tagToElseIfVarMethod tagToElseIfVar]
=== Parameters ===
 * *$var* _string_
  Dot-separated object path, eg Object.property.inneProperty


Replaces selected tag with PHP "else if" statement checking if $var evaluates  to true. $var must be an object available inside template's scope.




$var is passed in JS object convention (dot separated).
Method doesn't change selected elements stack. Returned is source element,  detached from it's parent.
Notice-safe.
Example  
{{{
 $template['.else-if-var']->tagToElseIfVar('foo.bar');

}}}
Source  
{{{
 <div class='else-if-var'><node1/></div>

}}}
Result  
{{{
 <?php
 else if ($foo->bar) {
 ?><node1/><?php
 }
 ?>

}}}
----
